name: 256ron
description:
A remake of the classic video game "Tron" for the 256 byte game competition at the Lovebyte 2021. Move your bike with the joystick or cursor keys and do not hit the walls or your own generated wall.

For your convenience we provide the complete source code here:

t=btn x=0y=0c=9s=0 function _draw() ?'\#0score '..s,0,0,9 if(t(0))c=4 if(t(1))c=6 if(t(2))c=1 if(t(3))c=9 pset(x,y,4)x+=(3&c)-1y+=(c/4&3)-1s+=1 if pget(x,y)>1then ?"\as9i4b1ge" cls()x=64s=0rect(0,7,127,127,5)y=x end pset(x,y,9)end

A game by The 7th Division and Vintage Computing Carinthia. 256 bytes should be enough for everybody!
